testimonials.quote: Arrived safely and works great! There are a couple of scratches on the glass, which I'm not certain happened in shipment, but I'm glad it arrived in one piece.
testimonials.author: lamthewalrus77

testimonials.quote: Great seller. As described. Fast dispatch. Well packaged and great communication. Thanks.
testimonials.author: baver3016

testimonials.quote: Fantastic work! My Sega Game Gear looks and plays like new. The screen replacement is crystal clear.
testimonials.author: retromaniac42

testimonials.quote: Quick turnaround and excellent communication throughout the repair process. My Lynx works better than it did when new!
testimonials.author: pixelpusher88
